title: Vehicle fire temporarily shuts down I-10 East near Rayne | Video | kadn.com
text:
Vehicle fire temporarily shuts down I-10 East near Rayne
- Updated
Traffic is slow-moving on I-10 East near Rayne after a vehicle caught fire, according to the Louisiana Department of Transportation and Development. I-10 East was temporarily closed near LA 35. The fire has been put out and all lanes have since reopened.
Tags
As featured on
RAYNE, La. (NEWS 15) — Traffic is slow-moving on I-10 East near Rayne after a vehicle caught fire, according to the Louisiana Department of Transportation and Development. I-10 East was temporarily closed near LA 35. The fire has been put out and all lanes have since reopened.

PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you. &&
